mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.user_id, t.cate_name, t.cate_pid, t.cate_sort, t.cate_level, t.path_trace, t.cate_desc, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM sens_post_category_ref r WHERE r.cate_id = t.id ) AS `count`, t.create_time FROM sens_category t ORDER BY t.cate_sort DESC

SELECT t.id, t.cate_name, t.cate_pid, t.cate_sort, t.cate_level, t.path_trace, t.cate_desc, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM sens_post_category_ref r WHERE r.cate_id = t.id ) AS `count`, t.create_time FROM sens_category t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t.cate_sort DESC

SELECT t.id, t.cate_name, t.cate_pid, t.cate_sort, t.cate_level, t.path_trace, t.cate_desc, t.create_time FROM sens_category t, sens_post_category_ref r WHERE r.post_id = #{postId} AND r.cate_id = t.id
SELECT id FROM sens_category WHERE path_trace LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pathTrace}, '%')
SELECT count( * ) FROM sens_post WHERE to_days( create_time ) = to_days( now( ) );
